summary: Wyatt writes an angry letter to his girlfriend, believing she's dating Ricker. Ricker's a dog. Helped by stripper Ivy, he tries to get the letter off a truck the next 24 hours.
cast: Paul Rudd|Christine Taylor|Reese Witherspoon|Sarah Silverman|Buffy Sedlachek|Richard Cody|Gary Wolf|Carl Anthony Payne II|Tim McNiff|Gale Plewacki|Tamara Mello|John Sylvain|William Byrd Wilkins|John Beasley|Larry Drake|Jack Walsh|Tobin Bell|Stephen Yoakam|Bruce Bohne|Maile Flanagan|Peter Schmitz|Grant Richey|Bill Schoppert|Jack McGee|Barbara Kingsley|Emil Herrera|Jay Gjernes|John-Clay Scott|Matt Klemp|Jim Belushi|John Fortson|Nathan Frenzel|Peter Moore|Shale Nelson|Marcus Anderson|Frank Crandell|James Fischer|Catherine E. Johnson|Gene Larche|Nick Lauren|John Murray|Lori J. Ness|Rachel Oliva|Kurt Schweickhardt|Jen Sharlow
title: Urgente por accidente
